uvi.description:
net: mdiobus: Fix memory leak in __mdiobus_register

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.76 by commit 3a0dc2e35a5d6546b1db87fe985582dadc64fe7b. For more details please see the references link.
